abstract: AdWords offers its users a text to study and rules to follow — but don’t ask too many questions.
snippet: AdWords offers its users a text to study and rules to follow — but don’t ask too many questions.
lead_paragraph: So far this year I’ve spent $75,124.77 on my Google AdWords campaign. That’s a little more than $400 a day. So, you can imagine how touched I was recently to find a small brown box from Google in my mailbox.

headline.main: AdWords and Me: Exploring the Mystery

abstract: It is buying its Manhattan office building for $1.8 billion, in one of the biggest commercial real estate deals ever.
snippet: It is buying its Manhattan office building for $1.8 billion, in one of the biggest commercial real estate deals ever.
lead_paragraph: Google isn’t much of a bargain hunter.

abstract: Google's proposed $6 billion bid for the social discount site Groupon would complement other local business-focused services, analysts say. DealBook's Evelyn M. Rusli examines the expected deal.
snippet: Google's proposed $6 billion bid for the social discount site Groupon would complement other local business-focused services, analysts say. DealBook's Evelyn M. Rusli examines the expected deal.
lead_paragraph: Google's proposed $6 billion bid for the social discount site Groupon would complement other local business-focused services, analysts say. DealBook's Evelyn M. Rusli examines the expected deal.

abstract: Google’s proposed $6 billion deal for the social discount site Groupon would complement other local business-focused services, analysts say.  Evelyn M. Rusli examines the possible deal, which stumbled late Friday evening when Groupon brushed it off — at least for now.
snippet: Google’s proposed $6 billion deal for the social discount site Groupon would complement other local business-focused services, analysts say.  Evelyn M. Rusli examines the possible deal, which stumbled late Friday evening when Groupon brushed it of...
lead_paragraph: 8:39 p.m. | Updated Google’s proposed $6 billion deal for the social discount-offer site Groupon would complement other services focused on local business, analysts say. Evelyn M. Rusli of DealBook examines the possible deal, which stumbled late Friday evening when Groupon brushed it off — at least for now.
